content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: nether_brick_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "brown_stained_glass", "quantity": 48, "index": 10}, {"type": "purpur_stairs", "quantity": 63, "index": 12}, {"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 6, "index": 17}, {"type": "quartz_stairs", "quantity": 9, "index": 18}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral_fan", "quantity": 2, "index": 21}, {"type": "magenta_wool", "quantity": 20, "index": 34}, {"type": "lime_concrete", "quantity": 28, "index": 37}, {"type": "trader_llama_spawn_egg", "quantity": 63, "index": 38}, {"type": "gray_terracotta", "quantity": 19, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft nether_brick_stairs, I need to place 3 nether_bricks in the bottom row of the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move one of the nether_bricks from slot 17 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 17 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: nether_brick_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "brown_stained_glass", "quantity": 48, "index": 10}, {"type": "purpur_stairs", "quantity": 63, "index": 12}, {"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 5, "index": 17}, {"type": "quartz_stairs", "quantity": 9, "index": 18}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral_fan", "quantity": 2, "index": 21}, {"type": "magenta_wool", "quantity": 20, "index": 34}, {"type": "lime_concrete", "quantity": 28, "index": 37}, {"type": "trader_llama_spawn_egg", "quantity": 63, "index": 38}, {"type": "gray_terracotta", "quantity": 19, "index": 42}]
thought: Now that the first nether_brick is in slot 1, I will move another to slot 4 to complete the bottom row.
Ok
act: move from slot 17 to slot 4 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "brown_stained_glass", "quantity": 48, "index": 10}, {"type": "purpur_stairs", "quantity": 63, "index": 12}, {"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 4, "index": 17}, {"type": "quartz_stairs", "quantity": 9, "index": 18}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral_fan", "quantity": 2, "index": 21}, {"type": "magenta_wool", "quantity": 20, "index": 34}, {"type": "lime_concrete", "quantity": 28, "index": 37}, {"type": "trader_llama_spawn_egg", "quantity": 63, "index": 38}, {"type": "gray_terracotta", "quantity": 19, "index": 42}]

Ok
